profile:
Adanac is dedicated to providing its customers with quality roofing and aluminum gutter services backed by strong workmanship and material warranties! Adanacâ€™s roofing capabilities encompass virtually all forms of steep-slope and flat roofing.

We strive to offer our customers the highest level of customer service in an effort to maintain a strong referral base. In doing this, we have succeeded in becoming one of the lower mainland's premier roofing companies.

 Adanac Roofing Supply and Install IKO, CertainTeed and Malarkey asphalt shingles. Synthetic product we supply and Install Davinci,Enviroshake and all types of metal roofs along with Cedar shakes.

profile: Penfolds Roofing & Solar has been serving the Greater Vancouver area and Fraser Valley since 1937, earning a reputation for honesty & quality craftsmanship with a wide range of superior re roofing shingles and roof shakes, such as the indestructible EcoRoof rubber shakes, including the latest technology in Solar PV. We service all types of roofs and customers, including Residential Re Roofing, Strata & Multi-Family properties, Commercial/Industrial, New Construction and we have a full service Service/Repairs department.  We also provide renewable technologies as in Solar Photovoltaics (Solar Panels) while roofing, or by itself.  We are a full service operation that warrantees and guarantees everything we do!
service_area: At Penfolds Roofing we have over 150 employees. We professionally service all roofing projects throughout the Lower Mainland, including Whistler/Squamish and out to Chilliwack
products: Rubber Roofing Shakes & Slate, Cedar Shakes, Laminated Shingles, Metal Roofing and seamless flat roofing

profile: Feel secure under your roof all winter and cut your heating/cooling costs with the re-roofing specialists of Whonnock Roofing Ltd. in Maple Ridge. profile:
A family owned Roofing and gutter company that focuses on quality roofing and a stress free experience. With roof replacement being a big project we try our best to make sure you are informed and comfortable with all your options. We are able to offer industry leading warranties and have all credentials, certifications, and insurances to complete your project on time and on budget. 

Proud partner of the Starfish Backpack Program.
